2017 Toyota Land Cruiser 79 4.5D V8 LX P/U Double Cab.
Only 30 000 km!
One owner, Full service history agents up to date, Spare keys, Accident free!
Extras worth around R 600 000 !
Best equipt Land Cruiser !

Also: Aircon, Radio/CD, Navigation, USB, Elec windows, 4x4, Low range, Dual diff-lock, ABS, Airbags, Sidesteps, Snorkel, 6 x Mags.
Exceptional condition!
R1299900
